entries.id: A Little Help From My Friends
entries.name: A Little Help From My Friends
entries.description: When you successfully aid someone you take +1 forward as well.

entries.name: A Port In The Storm
entries.description: When you return to a civilized settlement you’ve visited before, tell the GM when you were last here. They’ll tell you how it’s changed since then.

entries.name: An Ear For Magic
entries.description: When you hear an enemy cast a spell the GM will tell you the name of the spell and its effects. Take +1 forward when acting on the answers.

entries.name: Arcane Art
entries.description:
When you weave a performance into a basic spell, choose an ally and an effect:

  • Heal 1d8 damage
  • +1d4 forward to damage
  • Their mind is shaken clear of one enchantment
  • The next time someone successfully assists the target with aid, they get +2 instead of +1

Then roll+CHA. • On a 10+, the ally gets the selected effect. • On a 7-9, your spell still works, but you draw unwanted attention or your magic reverberates to other targets affecting them as well, GM’s choice.

Heal roll: [[/roll 1d8]]

Forward to damage roll: [[/roll 1d4]]

entries.name: Bamboozle
entries.description: When you parley with someone, on a 7+ you also take +1 forward with them.

entries.name: Bardic Lore
entries.description:
Choose an area of expertise:

  • Spells and Magicks
  • The Dead and Undead
  • Grand Histories of the Known World
  • A Bestiary of Creatures Unusual
  • The Planar Spheres
  • Legends of Heroes Past
  • Gods and Their Servants

When you first encounter an important creature, location, or item (your call) covered by your bardic lore you can ask the GM any one question about it; the GM will answer truthfully. The GM may then ask you what tale, song, or legend you heard that information in.

entries.name: Charming & Open
entries.description:
When you speak frankly with someone, you can ask their player a question from the list below. They must answer it truthfully, then they may ask you a question from the list (which you must answer truthfully).

  • Whom do you serve?
  • What do you wish I would do?
  • How can I get you to _____?
  • What are you really feeling right now?
  • What do you most desire?

entries.name: Con
entries.description: When you parley with someone, on a 7+ you also take +1 forward with them and get to ask their player one question which they must answer truthfully.

entries.name: Devious
entries.description: When you use Charming & Open you may also ask “How are you vulnerable to me?” Your subject may not ask this question of you.

entries.name: Duelist’s Block
entries.description: When you Hack & Slash, you take +2 armor forward.

entries.name: Duelist’s Parry
entries.description: When you Hack & Slash, you take +1 armor forward.

entries.name: Eldritch Chord
entries.description: When you use Arcane Art, you choose two effects. You also get to choose one of those effects to double.

entries.name: Eldritch Tones
entries.description: Your Arcane Art is strong, allowing you to choose two effects instead of one.

entries.name: Healing Chorus
entries.description:
When you heal with Arcane Art, you heal +2d8 damage.

Healing roll: [[/roll 2d8]]

entries.name: Healing Song
entries.description: When you heal with Arcane Art, you heal +1d8 damage.

entries.name: It Goes To Eleven
entries.description: When you unleash a crazed performance (a righteous lute solo or mighy brass blast, maybe) choose a target who can hear you and roll+CHA. • On a 10+ the target attacks their nearest ally in range. • On a 7-9 they attack their nearest ally, but you also draw their attention and ire.

entries.name: Metal Hurlant
entries.description: When you shout with great force or play a shattering note choose a target and roll+CON. • On a 10+ the target takes 1d10 damage and is deafened for a few minutes. • On a 7-9 you still damage your target, but it’s out of control: the GM will choose an additional target nearby.

entries.name: Multiclass Dabbler
entries.description: Get one move from another class. Treat your level as one lower for choosing the move.

entries.name: Multiclass Initiate
entries.description: Get one move from another class. Treat your level as one lower for choosing the move.

entries.name: Multiclass Master
entries.description: Get a move from another class. Treat your level as one lower for choosing the move.

entries.name: Reputation
entries.description: When you first meet someone who’s heard songs about you, roll+CHA. • On a 10+, tell the GM two things they’ve heard about you. • On a 7-9, tell the GM one thing they’ve heard, and the GM tells you one thing.

entries.name: Unforgettable Face
entries.description: When you meet someone you’ve met before (your call) after some time apart you take +1 forward against them.

entries.name: Vicious Blast
entries.description:
When you grant bonus damage with Arcane Art, you grant an extra +2d4 damage.

Bonus to damage roll: [[/roll 2d4]]

entries.name: Vicious Cacophony
entries.description: When you grant bonus damage with Arcane Art, you grant an extra +1d4 damage.
